thread.title: Lisa from Indiana
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Lisa from Indiana

author: Lisa from Indiana
title: Lisa from Indiana
text: We received our first order of halibut, king salmon, organic salmon marinade, organic seafood rub and organic virgin coconut oil. We already sought out organic foods and fish that we thought were good for living in Indiana and then we tried Vital Choice. This fish taste so fresh as if you were on the coast and it was fresh caught that day due to the way Vital Choice flash freezes their fish so quickly to keep its freshness. We also love the fact that it is delivered right to your front door. We are excited to try all of the Vital Choice products!!
